ProjectTitle: Revealing novel immunomodulatory myeloid niches for improving colorectal cancer immunotherapy
InitialFeedbackHistory:
21/04/2023
Have you considered any specific repositories for data sharing already? You can also use the KU Leuven data repository RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or a disciplinary repository, EBI (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/) for example has many for life sciences data, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
